full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### noticeType-avisType / Invitation to Qualify

#### title

- **title-titre-eng**: **IT Bid for Additionnal Fit-up Work at CRA Saint John NB EC015**
- **title-titre-fra**: **CMattour pour travaux d’agrandissement intérieur à ARC l’ARC Saint-John Nouveau-Brunswick EC015**

#### Event Details

- **solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation**: WS4509480204
- **amendmentNumber-numeroModification**: 7
- **publicationDate-datePublication**: April 30, 2024
- **tenderClosingDate-appelOffresDateCloture**: June 4, 2024 02:00 PM ADT

#### Pre-Qualification Requirements

This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) is the second phase of a two-stage process seeking qualified suppliers for the additionnal fit-up work at CRA Saint John NB (EC015). The ITQ invites suppliers who cleared the first phase to submit a financial bid on the project, based on specifications and drawings.

#### Bidding Requirements

- **procurementMethod-methodeApprovisionnement-eng**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **selectionCriteria-criteresSelection-eng**: Price

##### Classification

- **procurementCategory-categorieApprovisionnement**: Construction and Building Services
- **unspsc**: 72121103
- **unspscDescription-eng**: Commercial and office building renovation and repair service

#### Trade Agreement

- **tradeAgreements-accordsCommerciaux-eng**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contract Details

- **contractingEntityName-nomEntitContractante-eng**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **contractingEntityAddressLine-ligneAdresseEntiteContractante-eng**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact:
- **contactInfoName-informationsContactNom**: Sonia Stockman (SPAC/PSPC)
- **contactInfoEmail-informationsContactCourriel**: sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

*Note: This announcement was taken from a source document. Dates and details may change. Please always check the official government tender website for the latest information.**/note--
